Class DBComands

java.lang.Object
proiect.claseUser.DBComands
public class DBComands extends Object
The DBComands class provides a collection of methods for interacting with a database. It primarily focuses on managing user preferences, book reservations, and retrieving relevant data such as user-specific recommendations or borrowing history.

This class handles database connections, executes SQL queries, and processes the resulting data into various return types like lists, maps, and Boolean values. It includes operations for inserting, updating, and selecting data, with safety mechanisms such as rollback on errors and validation of user constraints.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBComands

      public DBComands()

  • Method Details

    • INSERT_INTO_USERPREF

      public void INSERT_INTO_USERPREF(String query, String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId, List<Integer> validGenreIds)
      Inserts user preferences into the database. The method processes a list of genre IDs associated with a specific user and saves them into the database in a batch operation. If an error occurs during the database interaction, a rollback is performed and an error message is displayed via an alert.
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL query to insert the user preferences
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to which the connection should be established
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose preferences are being saved
      validGenreIds - a list of valid genre IDs to be inserted as user preferences

    • SELECT_FROM_GENURI

      public Map<String,Integer> SELECT_FROM_GENURI(String query, String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS)
      Executes an SQL query to fetch data from a database table and maps the resulting rows into a Map String, Integer representation. The map keys correspond to the 'genuri' column values, and the values correspond to the 'idpreferinte' column values from the result set.
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL query to be executed against the database
      DB_URL - the URL of the database where the query will be executed
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      Returns:
      a map where keys are the 'genuri' (genre) column values and values are the 'idpreferinte' (preference ID) column values; returns an empty map if no data is found or if an error occurs during the operation

    • USER_ARE_PREF

      public Boolean USER_ARE_PREF(String query, String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int id)
      Checks if a user has preferences stored in the database by executing a given query. The method connects to the database using the provided connection parameters, executes the query with the user ID as a parameter, and returns whether the query finds any matching records.
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL query to be executed, which is expected to check user preferences
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for authenticating with the database
      DB_PASS - the password for authenticating with the database
      id - the unique identifier of the user to check preferences for
      Returns:
      true if the user has preferences; false otherwise

    • SELECT_ALL_FROM_BOOKS

      public List<Book> SELECT_ALL_FROM_BOOKS(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS)
      Method intended for debugging purposes. Not used in production code.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the database URL
      DB_USER - the database username
      DB_PASS - the database password
      Returns:
      a list of Book objects fetched from the database

    • SELECT_COVER_FROM_MYREADS

      public List<String> SELECT_COVER_FROM_MYREADS(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId)
      Retrieves a list of cover URLs from the "myreads" database table for a given user ID. This method establishes a connection to the database, executes a query to fetch cover URLs corresponding to the specified user, and returns the results as a list.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      a list of cover URL strings from the myreads table

    • REZULTATE

      public List<Book> REZULTATE(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, String titlu, String autor)
      Retrieves a list of books from the database based on the provided title or author. The method uses a SQL query with wildcard search to find books that match the given title or author either partially or fully.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      titlu - the title of the book to search for (supports partial matches using wildcard)
      autor - the author of the book to search for (supports partial matches using wildcard)
      Returns:
      a list of Book objects that match the search criteria

    • insertIntoImprumuturi

      public void insertIntoImprumuturi(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId, String titlu)
      Inserts a reservation for a book into the database for a specific user. Before insertion, the method checks if the user has already reserved the book or if the user has reached the maximum allowed limit for reservations. If either condition is met, it shows an alert and terminates the operation. Otherwise, it proceeds with the insertion.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database for establishing the connection
      DB_USER - the username for authenticating with the database
      DB_PASS - the password for authenticating with the database
      userId - the unique identifier of the user attempting the reservation
      titlu - the title of the book the user wants to reserve

    • IS_IN_USE

      public List<BookInfo> IS_IN_USE(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId)
      Fetches a list of books along with their statuses that are associated with a specific user, limited to the most recent six records, ordered by status and borrowing date. The information is retrieved from the database and returned as a list of BookInfo objects.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      userId - the unique identifier of the user for whom the borrowed books are being retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of BookInfo objects containing book details and their statuses

    • UPDATE_USERPREF

      public void UPDATE_USERPREF(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int number, int userId, int genre)
      Updates the user preferences in the database by incrementing the specified preference count for a given user and genre id. If the operation is successful, a confirmation message is displayed; otherwise, an error message is shown.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to which the connection should be established
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      number - the value to increment the preference count by
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose preference is being updated
      genre - the unique identifier of the genre to update the preference for

    • SELECT_ALL_FROM_USERPREF

      public List<Book> SELECT_ALL_FROM_USERPREF(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId)
      Retrieves a list of books from the database based on user preferences. The method connects to the database using the provided connection parameters and executes a query to fetch books that match the user's preferred genres. Books that the user has already interacted with in the "myreads" table are excluded. The results are sorted by the preference count in descending order.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose preferences are being used
      Returns:
      a list of Book objects matching the user's preferences, excluding already read books

    • SEARCH_BY_COVER

      public int SEARCH_BY_COVER(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, String cover)
      Retrieves the preference ID associated with a book's cover from the database. Establishes a connection to the database, executes a query to search for the genre preference ID that corresponds to the specified cover, and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      cover - the book cover to be used as the search parameter
      Returns:
      the preference ID associated with the specified cover, or -1 if no match is found

    • INSERT_INTO_USERPREF_GEN

      public void INSERT_INTO_USERPREF_GEN(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int number, int userId, int preferinte)
      Inserts or updates a user's preferences into the database. If the specified preference already exists for the given user, the existing record is updated. Otherwise, a new record is inserted into the database.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to establish a connection
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      number - the value to be set for the preference
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      preferinte - the preference ID to insert or update

    • DELETE_FROM_MYREADS

      public void DELETE_FROM_MYREADS(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId, List<String> coverImage)
      Deletes records from the "myreads" table in the database for a specific user based on the provided list of cover images.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the database URL used to establish the connection
      DB_USER - the username used to authenticate with the database
      DB_PASS - the password associated with the database user
      userId - the ID of the user whose records are to be deleted
      coverImage - a list of cover image URLs corresponding to the records to be deleted

    • DELETE_FROM_IMREADING

      public void DELETE_FROM_IMREADING(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId, List<Book> books)
      Deletes a list of books from the "I'm Reading" section for a specified user in the database.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      userId - the ID of the user whose books are to be deleted
      books - a list of books to be removed from the user's "I'm Reading" list

    • SELECT_ALL_FROM_REVIEWS

      public List<Review> SELECT_ALL_FROM_REVIEWS(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int idCarte)
      Retrieves a list of reviews from the database for a specified book ID. The method connects to the specified database, executes a query to fetch reviews associated with the given book ID, and returns the results as a list.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the URL of the database to connect to
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      idCarte - the ID of the book for which reviews are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a list of Review objects for the specified book ID

    • showAlert

      public void showAlert(String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with the given message.
      Parameters:
      message - the text message to be displayed in the alert dialog
